name: Alpha Space
description:
Small project for learning Godot 4.

Game is in a "playable" state, but is a work in progress. More 'Proof of Concept' than 'Game'. I wanted to have a web build, but as of now, it's not possible in Godot 4.

Goal:

Use the random letters to make words

Controls:

Left Click - Select Letter

Right Click - Store Letter

Hold R - Return to Main Menu
